Html: I have uploaded a couple of my characters into rawr, but for some reason even though it recognizes me as a horde character on each toon, the gear sets are all from alliance.  I have look everywhere in the settings and just can't find any way to change this.  Can someone help point me in the right direction here please?

If your talking about where things are bought from (such as the Valor and Justice points) yea that is defaulted to Alliance side. Some of the items do show who the horde vender is however it would be VERY tedius to add in the horde vender. Also keep in mind that the source info can only hold up to 3 sources. So some of the items will not have the room for the extra vender info. However there are items, such as the Tol Barad trinkets that have faction specific prerequisites. These are are automatically filtered for your faction.
